faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: You can track your order using the tracking link sent to your email.

faqs.question: Do you offer customer support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 customer support through chat and phone.

faqs.question: Can I change my shipping address?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change your shipping address before the order is shipped.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and UPI

faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions sent to your email.

faqs.question: How I cannot track my order?
faqs.answer: You cannot track your order using the bill/invoice.

faqs.question: Where is my order?
faqs.answer: You can check the status of your order using the tracking number provided in your order confirmation email.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries around the world. Shipping fees may vary.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Shipping typically takes 3-7 business days, depending on your location.

faqs.question: How do I apply a discount code?
faqs.answer: You can apply a discount code at checkout in the 'Promo Code' field.

faqs.question: What if my order arrives damaged?
faqs.answer: If your order arrives damaged, please contact customer support within 48 hours for a replacement or refund.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can contact customer support by emailing support@example.com or calling us at 1-800-123-4567.

faqs.question: How do I update my billing information?
faqs.answer: To update your billing information, log into your account, go to 'Settings', and then 'Billing Information'.

faqs.question: Where can I find the user manual?
faqs.answer: The user manual is available on our website under the 'Resources' section or directly at example.com/user-manual.

faqs.question: What is your privacy policy?
faqs.answer: Our privacy policy can be found at example.com/privacy-policy.

faqs.question: How do I subscribe to the newsletter?
faqs.answer: You can subscribe to our newsletter by entering your email address at the bottom of our homepage.

faqs.question: Can I change my order after placing it?
faqs.answer: You can change your order within 1 hour of placing it by contacting customer support.

faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM EST.

faqs.question: Do you have a physical store?
faqs.answer: We currently operate exclusively online and do not have a physical store.

faqs.question: How can I provide feedback?
faqs.answer: You can provide feedback by emailing feedback@example.com or through our contact form on the website.

faqs.question: What is your exchange policy?
faqs.answer: Our exchange policy allows exchanges within 30 days of purchase. Items must be in original condition.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift cards?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer gift cards which can be purchased on our website.

faqs.question: Can I expedite my shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, expedited shipping options are available at checkout for an additional fee.

faqs.question: How do I delete my account?
faqs.answer: To delete your account, please contact customer support and request account deletion.

faqs.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer bulk discounts for large orders. Please contact sales@example.com for more information.

faqs.question: What if I receive the wrong item?
faqs.answer: If you receive the wrong item, please contact customer support within 48 hours for assistance.

faqs.question: How do I unsubscribe from the newsletter?
faqs.answer: You can unsubscribe from the newsletter by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link at the bottom of any newsletter email.

faqs.question: What is your loyalty program?
faqs.answer: Our loyalty program rewards you with points for every purchase, which can be redeemed for discounts on future orders.

faqs.question: Do you offer free samples?
faqs.answer: We occasionally offer free samples with orders during promotional periods.

faqs.question: How do I update my shipping address?
faqs.answer: To update your shipping address, log into your account, go to 'Settings', and then 'Shipping Information'.

faqs.question: What if I forgot my username?
faqs.answer: If you forgot your username, please contact customer support for assistance.

faqs.question: How do I redeem my loyalty points?
faqs.answer: You can redeem your loyalty points at checkout by selecting the option to apply points to your purchase.

faqs.question: Can I return a gift?
faqs.answer: Yes, gifts can be returned within 30 days of purchase. The original receipt or gift receipt is required.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faqs.answer: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours of placement. After this period, cancellations are not possible.

faqs.question: Can I get an invoice for my purchase?
faqs.answer: Yes, invoices are sent to your email after purchase. You can also request a copy from customer support.

faqs.question: How do I change my email address?
faqs.answer: To change your email address, log into your account, go to 'Settings', and then 'Account Information'.

faqs.question: What can I ask you?
faqs.answer: You can ask me any customer query. Select any FAQ below and I will do my best to assist you.
